t: Avazu Case Study
s: Avazu is a technology-driven company dedicated to worldwide distribution of PC and mobile internet advertising and to performance marketing through programmatic advertising technologies. It was incorporated in Brunei in 2009, and established its headquarters in Shanghai in the same year.

t: Avazu Inc., Address, Data & More
s: Avazu Inc. has been dedicated to global programmatic advertising since 2009. Avazu DSP started in early 2010 and officially entered mobile market in 2014. With years of continuous progress, Avazu Inc. has expanded to 15 global office branches, 500+ international employees.
